                                                  **EID Mubarak To All Muslims**


KhanWebHost PVT LTD is a privately owned company based out of Pakistan. We have been in business since 2016 with currently about 2000+ valuable customers from every part of the world. We had some spare stock so decided to offer some specials in limited quantity. There are only 5 of those available in each location

Few Features

* Virtulizor Control Panel
* DirectAdmin license (5.50$/m)
* Free WordPress Setup with OLS+WordPress (Open Support Ticket)
* Free WordPress Setup with Nginx+WordPress (open Support Ticket)
* AMD Ryzen,Intel Xeon Servers
* NVME,SSD Raid Drives
* Multiple Location (Phoenix,Germany,France,UK)
* DDOS Protection (except phoenix)
* Instant Setup (Depends on Orders)
* Get IPv6 address for free
* 24/7 Technical Support
* Templates & ISOs for all major distros
* 7 days Money Back Guarantee ( New Clients Only )

**EID Special KVM Plan 1 $19.99/Year) **

* 1 CPU Cores (Fair Usage)
* 1 GB RAM
* 30 Gb SSD Disk Space
* 2 TB Bandwidth Phoenix 
* 5 TB Bandwidth United Kingdom,France.Germany
* 1 IPV4
* 1Gbit Port - **Phoenix,Germany**
* 500Mb/sec Port - United Kingdom,France
